example: Remove the [MPSC]{REG} from the [splenic vein]{REG} and the [IVC graft]{REG} on the [IHIVC]{REG}
Transfer the [solution]{REG} with {pasteur pipette}[Device] into the [vials]{Container}
Measure out [100 ml]{Volume} of [10 mM HCl solution]{Concentration} using a [250 ml beaker]{Volume}.
Incubate the solution at [37°C]{Temperature} for [1 hour]{Time}.
Cut a [10 cm]{Length} piece of [filter paper]{Length} and weigh it on a [digital scale]{Mass}.
Fill a [50 ml]{Volume} [graduated cylinder]{Volume} with [distilled water]{Concentration} up to the [25 ml]{Volume} mark.
